scenes.background: (Monica) nods at Bob's suggestion. (Bob) leans back in his chair, looking at both of you.
scenes.description: 'Do you think it's feasible to start implementing this new system immediately?'

options.text: Yes, we can start with a pilot phase to see how it works.
options.analysis: You proposed a practical approach, showing good perception and social skills, though your motivation and self-regulation were moderate.

options.text: I think we need more time to plan it out properly before jumping in.
options.analysis: You expressed caution and the need for thorough planning, showing strong self-regulation but lower empathy and motivation.

options.text: Honestly, rushing into this might cause more confusion. We need a proper strategy first.
options.analysis: Your response was somewhat passive-aggressive, showing lower empathy and self-regulation, and it might create tension with colleagues.
